var mod1 = require("./lib/my-module.js");
var mod2 = require("./lib/my-module.js");
mod1.increment();
var result = mod2.increment();

// in lib/my-module.js:
var counter = 0;
exports.increment = function() {
  counter += 1;
  return counter;
};
